summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3731 , for the improvement of the alley in block 27, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between 11th Avenue North and 12th Avenue North, from Hamlin Street to Shelby Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45799 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
